description:
Demon Kyouzaburou is the leader of the Demon Seed. Very confident with his work, he believes the group can spend as much money as they want, thinking they can get more at any time. However, he runs out of money to fix the Power Suits after Maron`s first interference, and takes the Demon Seed into hiding for a few months.
Wikipedia
name: Demon Kyouzaburou
